AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Texas: state where the juvenile court is located
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Texas Juvenile Justice Department: department to which J.M.E. was committed for an indeterminate term, not to exceed his nineteenth birthday, providing a structured facility for rehabilitation and confinement
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Judge Ricardo Garcia Regional Detention: detention center where J.M.E. was placed and also referred to as 'the Center', had issues with J.M.E. not participating in counseling sessions and initiating fights, and where he was unsuccessfully discharged, with requirements that J.M.E. failed to comply with
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Webb County Jail: location where J.M.E. was attending school, receiving good grades, attending CAPS counseling, and receiving SCAN services
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Southwest Keys: program for counseling, part of the conditions of probation for J.M.E.
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Youth Village: location for Cognitive Life Skills, part of the conditions of probation for J.M.E.
